member.name: M:ForumSPA.Server.Controllers.ForumController.GetHubModels
member.summary: Gets the list of hubs in HubModel form.
member.returns: A GenericGetResult that contains the list of hubs in HubModel form.

member.name: M:ForumSPA.Server.Controllers.ForumController.CreateHub(ForumSPA.Shared.Models.HubModel)
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST api/Forum/hub { "name": "Fight Club", "rules": "1. You do NOT talk about Fight Club", "description": "Fight!" }
